extends AI
    Handles the code to generate a projectile and set it to shoot at the player

      • AIShootProjectileAtPlayer

        public AIShootProjectileAtPlayer(Entity e,
                         int speed,
                         int dist,
                         int dam,
                         int type)
        Parameters:
        e - The Entity that owns this AI
        speed - The rate of attack, higher numbers mean slower speeds
        dist - The distance that the Entity will attempt to fire at
        dam - The amount of damage for the Projectile to deal
        type - The type of Projectile to fire
